summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing an upcoming interview. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and is intended solely for the recipient. It highlights the private nature of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing a confidential matter regarding an interview.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, which discusses an interview related to a third party.

keyFacts: The email was sent on May 4, 2010.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
The email discusses an upcoming interview for a third party.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email content is prohibited.
